title: "Robotic Gradient Wallpapers"
content:
ðŸ¤–ðŸŽ¨ Welcome to Robotic Gradient Wallpapers! ðŸŒˆ

Our website offers a unique collection of wallpapers featuring simple graphic designs of robotic arms set against beautiful gradient backgrounds. 

Whether you're a fan of robots or just appreciate eye-catching wallpapers, our collection has something for everyone. Our wallpapers are perfect for adding a touch of personality and style to your desktop, laptop, or mobile device.

All of our wallpapers are carefully crafted to ensure that they look great on any screen size. We offer a variety of color options, so you can choose the perfect wallpaper to match your personal style.

So why settle for a boring, plain wallpaper when you can have a cool and colorful robotic design? Browse our collection today and find the perfect wallpaper for your device!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a robot arm, against a gradient background of two complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
